title: Capabilities and limitations of Pb, Sr and Fe isotopic analysis of iron-rich slags: a case study on the medieval port at Hoeke (Belgium)
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,21887-21900
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA02887B, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported Licence.
Paulina Biernacka, Marta Costas-Rodríguez, Wim De Clercq, Stijn Dewaele, Johan De Grave, Frank Vanhaecke
An analytical approach was developed for Pb, Sr, and Fe isotopic analysis of archaeological samples recovered from an iron work site by using multi-collector inductively coupled plasma – mass spectrometry (MC-ICP-MS).
